body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us. My name is Aaron White and I work for SecureRide, a company that provides security solutions for vehicles.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Laura. Can you please provide me with your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's the twenty-third of March, nineteen ninety-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Laura. And could you also share your home address with me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's three four five Pine Street, Cityville, A-B-C, one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that information.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I appreciate your time, Laura. If you have any more questions or concerns, feel free to reach out. Thank you and have a great day.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Aaron. Have a good day too.
